short_summary: The desired outcome is a fully functional data warehouse that will be leveraged by the Agency in the delivery of reports and business intelligence information.
description: Elections Canada requires the services of senior Data Warehouse Modeller
full_summary:
---

### Data Warehouse Modeller – Level 3

**Reference Number:** PW-22-01012085

**Solicitation Number:** ECEB-RFP-2022-1752

**Publication Date:** November 1, 2022

**Tender Closing Date:** November 22, 2022 at 2:00 p.m.

### Introduction
Elections Canada is seeking the services of a senior data warehouse architect to assist in designing, building, and implementing its Corporate Data Warehouse.

### Description of Requirement
The incumbent would be responsible for creating a fully functional data warehouse that leverages business intelligence information and facilitates report delivery.

### Requirements

*   Estimated effort: 150 days
*   Estimated number of contracts: 1
*   Mandatory security clearance: DOS – Reliability (Minimum)
*   Candidate must have experience in data warehouse design and implementation

### Delivery Information
Deliverables will be submitted electronically via epost Connect or in person at the Business Centre.

### Contact Information
For more information, please contact:

Benest, Eric, Advisor, Procurement and Contracting Services  
Email: [eric.benest@elections.ca](mailto:eric.benest@elections.ca)  
Phone: 873-416-0972  
Address: Elections Canada, 30 Victoria Street, 1st Floor (Business Centre), Gatineau, QC K1A 0M6

### Special Considerations
This procurement is restricted to Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) Supply Arrangement Holders only. Interested parties can find more information on becoming a qualified SA Holder at [www.tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](http://www.tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca).
